subject: Simsonn Pro X Ultra - Throttle Issue
description_text:
Hello,

I'm having issues with my Simsonn Pro X Ultra throttle pedal. Even when I'm
not pressing it at all, it's registering shaky/forced input in the
software.

What I've already tried:

   -

   Full recalibration multiple times
   -

   Adjusted dead zone settings (no improvement)
   -

   Different USB ports
   -

   The issue shows up in the device software itself, not just in-game

The pedal physically returns to resting position fine, but the sensor seems
to be picking up phantom inputs or noise. It's making it impossible to
drive smoothly.

conversations.body_text: Hi Net Kek，  如果出现这种情况，则表明计算机接地不良，可能是因为三孔插头未与三孔墙壁插座匹配。您可以参考以下帖子：将计算机机箱连接到支架上，并将控制盒连接到踏板上的金属螺丝上。这应该可以解决断连问题。https ://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
